content.detailedDescription: It was about 9:30 p.M. and i began walk on the walkway to my house as i saw a very fast object fliying over my house. i could not tell how high the craft was in the sky overhead because all i saw were the four horizontal white lights that i could tell were on the craft. it was traveling very fast. faster than any jet i have ever seen before. as the lights went over my head the lights turned vertical and i was speechlees because it made absolutley no noise. as i turned my head it kept its speed and i lost veiw of the lights in about two seconds. nothing can travel that fast and be that low to the ground and not make a sound that we know is in existence it was just incredible.
content.summary: Four horizontal lights

content.detailedDescription:
As i was driving westbound on i16 (away from savannah, towards macon), i started seeing a very bright flashing light over the northern tree line.  i at first thought that it could be heat lightning, but then noticed that it was too rhythmic and consistent.  this is a very rural area, even just a short distance out of macon, and there were no other major lights or cars around at this time.  after a minute or two of the seeing the light blinking, an object came over the tree line (southbound) and i could see that the pulsating light was coming from the bottom of it.  the light was too bright when it was on to make out the shape of the object emitting it, and when the light went out i could not see anything. the object was several hundred yards above the trees, and came over the tree line in to sight for only a few seconds. it made an abrupt u-turn and went back northbound and out of sight.  my first thought was that it must be a helicopter, but i quickly decided that it was not for several reasons: 1. helicopters usually use a spotlight to look for something, not a flashing light that projects from the bottom and side of it. this would not be useful for any normal purpose. 2. it's movement was too smooth and unwavering to be a helicopter. 3. i did not hear any sound (my windows were up at this time).  my second thought was that it could be a weather balloon, but weather balloons do not move of their own accord - especially in such a fast, smooth manner.  i also thought to look for reactions from other people, but there was literally nobody else on this rural section of interstate.  
approximately 20-30 minutes later i had turned onto i75 northbound and was just north of macon.  this is a much more highly trafficked portion of interstate and there were now several other vehicles around. as i continued north, i observed a flashing light, exactly as described before, over the western tree line.  after several seconds, the object came over that tree line (eastbound) and over the southbound lane of i75. other vehicles started braking dramatically as they were staring at the object (light traffic, no other reasons to stop). the object never came to a complete stop, but slowed almost to hover and then turned northbound (appx. 90 degree turn) for a short distance before turning and traveling back over the western tree line.  during the encounter this time, i thought to role my window down, but was unable to hear anything.  the distance was such that i definitely would have heard it if it was a helicopter. the height was about the same as before, and i would say, in linear distance, it was no more than about 1 - 2,000 yards from me. i would estimate the maximum travel speed (that i saw) to be 40-60mph. also, judging by the size of the light when it was illuminated, i would say the object (craft?) was approximately the size of a large helicopter or small plane. 

note: the date and time given for this event are approximate, as this was written well after the fact.

regarding credibility: i am college educated police officer in a major suburb of atlanta. i have never posted anything like this before, and do not claim any supernatural/extra-terrestrial activity to have occurred - simply and unexplained sighting that has made me very curious. this was striking enough to me that i have often pondered it over the last several years, but never knew of an appropriate venue to discuss it until i found this website. i also noticed that there is another user who posted a somewhat similar, but slightly vague, incident in the same date range in the same area.  that definitely made me feel more obliged to post this.
content.summary: Driving on i75 north, and i16 west in middle ga -- flashing object

content.detailedDescription:
At end of september or first of october 1997(exact date?)i was camping in new mexico near the state line of colorado, south of durango with my wife. we were in a camper parked on a hill over looking a big lake.  i woke to wind & lightning in the distance to the north and saw a huge oval shape throbbing with light as big storm clouds ripped past it. it was many miles from me but i had a clear view, the clouds were near it only. it was clearly pulsing with light over all but had a linier effect of multi colored lights aross the bottom area. massive bolts of lighning were coming from above it to the ground to the east, or down wind. i saw many bolts of this lightning.  then a massive white beam of light shot from beneath the oval down to the ground. i remember it was 5:30 in the morning. the beam lasted a few minutes then shut off. the throbbing light faded and the lightning quit. over all that was the end of it. i was on a fishing trip so i fished all the next day. then late the next day i thought about it more and looked at the map to assume this events location. it was close to bayfield so i called the sheriffs office in bayfield colorado and spoke to a deputy that had seen the same thing. at first he wouldn't say anything and quizzed me about what i had seen. after i told him my story he said he saw the same as he drove into work that morning. he said his view was from underneath it as he was on hwy 160 east of durango, colorado. he mentioned the multicolored lights on the edges and the throbbing massive element above him . and he said the shaft of light hit the ground about 1000 yards from him. said it was as white and bright as anything. then shut off and it left the area. he said he had a police dog with him that cried and its hairs stood on end. he investgated the ground under the light but found nothing. 
i called the durango airport tower and they reported nothing... they had to have seen this. it was enormous. have not thought much about it untill i learned of your organization the other day.
content.summary: Massive, clouded, lits edges, bolts of lightnnig, huge shaft of light to ground

content.detailedDescription: First started, my brother, mike halligan, was on a cruise ship to cozumel with family. it was about 11:30 p.M. on 11-23-06. looked like an orb! close by was a ufo. the orb was round in shapeand very bright white/light blue. the ufo was round and had several colors,-blue, red, purple, pink, yellow, orange, green. the orb flew into the ufo, then the ufo left sporadically.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering

content.detailedDescription: Stayed virtually motionless in the sky like a star but it was too low. the orange was bright and was hard to make out the red lights on the side. they were very faint. i went inside for a second and when i went back out it was gone and the sky seemed brighter.
content.summary: Hovering orange glow with red light on each side.

content.detailedDescription: After eating supper in town of whitney tx on the evening of dec 30, 2008, my husband and i were driving back home about 7:15 pm and saw this object.  this date is approximate, but i do know it was on the day he returned from one of his trips as a corporate jet pilot.  it was a very cloudy, misty, wet and cold evening - very dark.  the object became visible to us in the southwest sky even through the clouds over a pasture to the south of hwy 22 between whitney and the dam at lake whitney.  at first, we thought it was fireworks because of the fluorescent glow, but it was coming down rather than gowing up.  then, we thought it was a falling star; but we've never seen one that color - bright fluorescent green.  also, it did not burn out as it come closer to earth.  there was a brighter clear light at it's bottom tip.  it was coming straight down virtically, then; it swiveled to reveal that it was not one light but two; and we were only seeing one side at first.  as it got close to earth (a few feet over the tops of the trees), it quickly turned horizontally and sped off away from town and out of view.  the whole event lasted for only a few seconds, so we did not have time to get a picture.  plus, it's movement was so fast, it would not be possible if we were prepared for it and had a camera in hand.  we thought we would hear from others in town or the area about seeing the same thing but have not yet.  when the sightings surfaced later in the stephenville area, we thought our info might be helpful as well.  we have been very curious about what it was since we've never heard of any lights of this nature or seen anything like it before.  let us know if we can provide any other details.
content.summary: Bright green fluorescent cylinder shape with clear lights at tip

content.detailedDescription:
On or about april 15 (exact date can be checked as we filed a flight plan to dyersburgh tenn.)a friend of mine ( now deceased less than a month later ) and i were to fly machined parts from his company to dyersburgh tenn. we rented a cessna 172 and flew straight thru with no problem. in the flight office prior to our return flight we were watching a line of thunderstorms moving west to east and trying to decide when it would be safe to depart. as the line moved thru we decided to takeoff and fly to the backside of the storms heading north while the storms moved off. 
         i wrote our departure time on the edge of the flight map as approx. 8:10 pm. we were ,what i believed to be an hour and a half into our flight when, as we flew north (i was piloting the aircraft and tom was tending to the navigation)we began to encounter some clouding conditions and zero visibility. i immediatly changed our heading 180 degrees. a moment later ( or so it seemed ) tom said to me " what time have you got?" i immediatly felt as though i had just been awoken. i was trying to gather my thoughts when tom said " hey, your watch is stopped" i looked at my wrist watch and it was stopped at 7:25 , which alarmed me as i had used it earlier to check our departure time. i looked at all of our guages and they were not functioning either. tom had a laptop nav. device that wasn't working either. we were both speechless for a short time.
          we were now in clear air and found a private airstrip to set down at. getting our bearings again and with all the equipment back up and running ( watch included, though still an hour and a half behind ) we flew on back to dayton intn'l with no further incidents.
          we didn't discuss it much after that and tom had a massive heart attack a few weeks later and died. myself, i started drawing. i will include some of these drawings i did after our flight.
          i have some more drawings but can't seem to get them uploaded. i have also some other sightings to report at some point that i have seen around wright pat.  as i live not far from there.
content.summary: Time loss during civilian night flight

content.detailedDescription:
A beautiful day in july of 1979.  i was driving my dad's car to a nearby town.  my 4 year old son was in the back seat.  he was sitting right behind me.  as we drove along a short stretch of straight road that had few houses, mostly fields, he kept asking me "mommy what's that?"  i looked in my rear view mirror and noticed that he was looking up out of his window.  without looking where he was looking i just answered "a bird", "a phone wire".  he asked me again "mommy what's that?"  this time i looked out of my window and looked up.  to my amazement i saw a chrome silver coloured object in the sky hovering above us.  i can remember how beautiful the blue sky was against this object.  it was barbell shaped
(cylinder shaped body with round balls at each end of the cylinder).  i watched it as i drove.  we had to drive about a quarter mile before i could stop.  it followed us around a bend and over a bridge.  when i pulled the car over and got out it started rising straight up until it was out of sight.  it made no noise.  

i tried to make sense of what it could have been at the time when my son asked me "mommy what's that?"  i do remember being very excited.  after it disappeared i raced to my sister's office (she worked for the local police department) and i told her what we saw and asked if anyone else had reported a ufo sighting.  no one else had. 

today, january 21, 2008 is the first time i've ever looked on the internet to see if there were any ufo pictures that showed a likeness to the object i witnessed.  i did find a site www.Ufocasebook.Com "the best ufo pictures ever take, page 8.  the photo of the object shot by steve mera july 2005 in the united kingdom is identical to the object i witnessed.  if you click on the photo it will show you the whole photo.  it made me very excited again to see that object, and to know that someone else saw the same type of craft that i saw some 26 years later.

the attached photo is that taken by steve mera.  but it is exactly like the one i saw.
content.summary: Barbell shaped object.  followed my car for 1/4 mile.  it was chrome silver in colour.  it was silent.  it lifted itself straight up and out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
This picture was taken by the person submitting this report with a canon s2is digital camera.  the camera recorded the date as 4/19/07 and the time as 2:03pm.  the date is correct, and the time is at least approximately correct.  the location is county road 308 in blanco county, texas.  the approximate direction of the road is north.

the photographer used the viewfinder to compose a scenic picture consisting of the dirt road, the bluebonnets, the tree & the clouds above the road.  she was unaware of the image above the tree on the extreme right.

our pictures were downloaded from the camera to our computer shortly after our return home.  a few days later, we were viewing the pictures on our computer monitor for the purpose of culling and editing them.  only then did we notice the image above the tree in the picture.  when we zoomed in, we realized that it had a very defined shape, with clear, sharp edges.

our first thought was that this could be glare or reflection on the camera lens.  closer examination showed that there were clouds between the camera and the image, which seems to disprove that idea.  i refer to ���image��� instead of ���object��� because the sheer size seems to rule out anything capable of flying.

the only other explanation we could think of was that this could be the shadow of a conventional aircraft between the sun and the top of the clouds, but the clouds in that area of the sky are not solid enough to allow such a smooth & well-defined shadow.  also, a shadow should be black; and an aircraft would have to be huge for a shadow that size.

although i have made references to the enormous size of the image, we have no way to make any kind of estimate.  the angle between the camera and the image indicates considerable horizontal distance, and its location above the clouds indicates considerable vertical distance; yet the image is very prominent in the picture.  we have nothing which would indicate speed or direction of travel, if any.  it was a very bright day, so automatic exposure time would be nil.

there is a white or light-colored streak running diagonally across the image and extending down into the area behind the treetop.  it looks very much like a thin tornado.  we originally could only imagine a nose-down delta wing aircraft shape.  after much review, there seems to be no reason to assume that the dark object extends down behind the white streak, which allows the concept of a different shape.  the streak does not appear to be a cloud.

we made 85 pictures in that general area (texas hill country) on that day, but none of the others include that image.  had we known it was there, we would have dozens of pictures!

the attachments are as follows:  
(1)   exact copy of original;
(2)   cropped portion of original;
(3)   cropped portion with gamma adjustment to enhance detail.		

we make no claims as to the nature of the image; only that these pictures are not posed and are not ���doctored��� in any way except as noted above.  we are interested in finding a reasonable explanation.  these pictures were shown to a camera shop owner in tyler, who did not believe the image could be a problem with the camera.  they were also shown to the kltv weatherman in tyler, who did not think it was a weather phenomena.  neither could offer a suggestion as to the nature of the image.
content.summary: Picture of unknown object or image in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was lying in bed, waiting to fall asleep. the blinds were open, so i looked outside, towards the north and east. through the branches of a tree in my front yard, i saw three lights in a triangle formation, bouncing/jumping around in place. honestly, it looked like something off tv, so i immediatly thought "aliens." i froze at first, then freaked out, panicked, and kind of lost it. i couldn't just close the blinds because if it was extraterrestrial it was too late to "hide." so i jumped out of bed, took my phone, started to leave my room, but went back to the window to check. it was still there. so i ran to my parents' room, where i eventually slept, after becoming extemely paranoid and almost hysterical. i shivered, hiding under the covers for almost another hour. i live right near i66, so every time a car went down the highway it sounded like a space craft to me. before i made my dad close the blinds in their room, i saw a light in the wooded area behind my house, which could have just been from the street behind those woods, but i don't really know. the trees were still pretty dense as it wasn't quite winter yet.
the experience was so strong that i'll never forget the date or time or how paranoid i felt. since then i sometimes get panic attacks when i'm the last one up, and trying to fall asleep. every little noise makes me jump. the last big panic attack was christmas eve. i sleep with my cell phone and a stuffed animal and even a nightlight. i'm  not prone to believe wild stories, or ghosts or aliens, but this experience has had a big impact on me. even though i only saw the thing for a few seconds, it was how i felt that will really stick with me.
content.summary: Triangle of lights bouncing around in place

content.detailedDescription: I saw them from my driveway,ran into the house and got my video camera and filmed the best i could while holding a child and standing on a hot driveway with no shoes on.I have the objects on film which also has my children recorded on it. i am more than willing to let someone take the u.F.O. section off my video tape. my oldest son at the time also watched it with me, he was 6 at the time.The objects stayed still for a long time than moved slowly but two stayed the same distance apart and the third took off and came back in the distance.I have always been afraid to tell anyone until i saw a u.F.O. program on t.V. 1-19 08 on our cable t.V. station.People said i was nuts when i told them even when i showed the video. so i kept is quiet all this time but have been dyind to share it with someone who would show concern.I dont know how to put the video clip on the net. please feel free to contact me.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 bright dots

content.detailedDescription:
Aeroskobing, denmark. 2005

aeroskobing, a small farming and fishing and leisure community, is located between odense and mainland denmark, far south, near the german border.  there are few modern conveniences, and 95% of the buildings on the entire island (which i was able to bike in a few days) are 19th century or earlier, and many farmsteads.  the island had one unique modern convenience, windmills.  sleek, tall, white, and more or less randomly scattered around the island.  there have been people on the island for centuries, and there are several viking sites scattered around as well.

our experience occurred early to mid morning.  i cannot recall the exact date and time of the event.  there were six people who witnessed the event, including myself, who set out for an extended bike ride around the island.  we left the main hub town, where a ferry ports from the mainland, and headed along a rural bike path, near the water (which was never that far away).  we ended up making some wrong turn and stopped to consult a map.  at this moment one of the members of the group directed our attention, and eyes, to a strange cloud formation maybe a mile away, asking ���what is that?��� the cloud, dark and heavy like a rain cloud, was over a field of wheat or some grain.  the cloud was at a normal height and unremarkable size, and was comparable to other clouds we had seen on the island, and presently near it.  the cloud itself was not that unusual.  what was unusual was a long cylindrical ���tube��� that came down towards the ground.  the tube did not taper like a tornado, but was consistent in diameter, like a hose.  the weather conditions were fair, maybe a bit windy being a sparsely treed island, but nothing near a storm.  it came down quite a ways and appeared near the ground, maybe several hundred feet above-hard to measure.  what was strange is that the tube didn���t appear affected by the wind around us, or near the trees on the edges of the field we noticed it above.  also, when the tube began to move, it seemed to have an independent motion and speed than the surrounding environment.  it almost looked alive. 

no one in the group (aged 21 to mid 50���s) had every seen anything like this.  the moment was a stand still, we were all dumfounded.  as we watched the tube in disbelief it began to ���recoil��� in much the same way a snails eye retracts into the head of the snail, kind of whipping about like a hose, but slower.  at this point we took some pictures, as it neared the mass of cloud.  in one picture you can clearly see a circle of cloud, this was a ���cross section��� of the tube, as it recoiled and the ���opening��� at the bottom of the tube faced our direction, right before it was engulfed into the cloud.  
after a period of possibly 3 to 10 minutes (very hard to tell how long) the cloud returned to normal, leaving no signs of unusual activity.  
there was a range of emotional reactions to the event.  the older people felt like not discussing the event, or offering any type of speculation as to what had happened.  the younger 20 years olds, myself in this category, were quick to assume some ufo related event.  it certainly was an electric sensation, the sensation of seeing something totally new and otherworldly that was undeniable happening in front of you.

we never saw any ���ufo��� during this part of the event.  only when i zoomed in to the pictures later that evening did i notice an ���orb��� an only after getting the images onto a computer did i notice the second ���orb���.  
no one in the village town that we talked to had any similar experiences.
content.summary: Descending cylinder of cloud later reveals two orbs in photographs.

content.detailedDescription:
i was a small child playing in the back yard of my rural east texas home when i saw it.  my mother was inside and i called to her several times to come look. finally i said "mommy, come look at this funny looking moon".  it seemed to have been hovering while i was alone but when she came out it started to move, slowly to the northest.
  we walked around the corner of the house to find that our elderly neighbors were also watching it from across the road.
it moved directly over our house from southeast to northwest.  there were no memorable flashing lights but a disk or "saucer" like object that seemed to be sitting still then moved away with deliberation. we watched until it was out of our sight.
 it was smaller than a full moon but still perfectly round, so it must have been fairly close to the ground, perhpas five to ten thousand feet.
there was no sound.
 mother and i discussed this many times over the years but i still have a vivid memory of the event.
content.summary: A late 1940's sighting in a rural texas setting.

content.detailedDescription: Thought we saw planet by naked eye, got 6" diameter telescope and watched large orange globe with hundreds of smaller spheeres circling around same, periodically one of the small spheres would leave and another would join, watched for a couple hours
content.summary: Large spheere witn many small ones

content.detailedDescription: I was at my home in carrollton tx and i was getting ready fixing to go out for new years and i was getting ready,while my boyfriend and his friend were waiting outside. my boyfriend then screamed my name to go outside. my sister and her husband who where also inside ran outside with me. when i looked up there where 4 orange lights in the sky. they where in a perfect line and perfectly seperated and they where moving slowly across the sky heading south. the fourth light that was at the end seemed to be staying a lil behind and then sped up a bit back to its spot. we stood there and watched the lights as each one just seemed to fade into the sky this lasted maybe 5 to 7 minutes until the last light disappeared into the sky. at that moment we didnt know who to call and like always are camera was dead. i wanted to report it but i listened to the radio and watched the news and didnt hear any reportings. so i felt stupid to report, but as i am hearing about all the sightings in texas its freaking me out and made me realize that we where not the only ones who saw the lights.
content.summary: 4 orange lights in a staright line

content.detailedDescription:
When i read about the ufo event in stephenville, tx, i thought it was the right time in my life to report my own ufo encounter i've kept quiet about for almost 35 years. i'm thankful mufon exists, and i'm not alone in the world as a credible witness to such amazing events.

i recall my age as about 12 or 13, so it must have been about 1972 or 1973.  it was a pleasant and clear-sky spring or summer day, i believe, and mid- to late afternoon.  memory a bit hazy on this.

i was sitting on the ground in the middle of a large green space made up of at least three or four contiguous baseball fields. at the time, these fields were located between brentwood shopping center on winton road, and the intersection of winton and galbraith roads, in finneytown, ohio���a northern suburb of cincinnati, ohio. the field was next door to my home.
so, there i was, in this field, reading a book.  reading was and is my passion, and i often visited this area to do this. at the time, i was on the only person present in this vast expanse of grass.

while engaged in reading, for some reason i felt compelled to suddenly look in the sky. i think it must have been the flashing lights i saw when i did so. seems that in this clear sky i saw a bright blue or red light with a ghostly gray object somehow behind it; no defined shape to it as it must have been too high in the sky. but it was blinking or flshing rapidly. then another light joined it in the sky. and they were moving about above and in front of me; as if their lights were for me to see. 

at one point, both lights were to the left; then suddenly, they ���jumped��� to the right side of the sky as if they were instantly transported to that point in space, or had travelled at speed of light and then somehow put on super-brakes once they reached their destination in the sky. i did not have to move my head to watch them move back and forth; and somehow this fact made me think that they were very close to me. they'd also appear close together in front of me in the sky.

they made no sound. i remember that detail very well.

my first thought upon seeing all this was curiosity; then i was just caught up with the strangeness of the sight for a few minutes without a sense of fear.  but as my mind began to grasp the reality of the situation, i became fearful without hysterics. i couldn���t believe what i was seeing, and knew that i had to get someone else to confirm that this strange event was really happening���and to get somewhere safe. i believed i was seeing ufos, and there was a pattern of intelligence in the movements.

so after at least 10 minutes of watching what i believe were up to three ufos, i ran back to my home. it took less then 5 minutes to get to my front door. upon entering my home i quickly and earnestly shared what had happened with my mother. 

i led my mom to the back bedroom on the second floor, which had a window facing the baseball fields and another window a few feet away on the adjacent wall. together the windows gave us a good view of the outside.
right away, from that vantage point, mother and i both saw one cigar-shaped, matte-gray (not shiny) flying object come into view directly in our line of sight on our same plane. it was very close, and not blurry to our eyes at all. none of the others was seen.

i do recall it had a few rapidly blinking lights (i think they were blue) arranged in a straight, vertical line. it was difficult to determine its size; but if i had to guess i���d say about 20 feet long.  relatedly, it was difficult to tell how far away it was from us; perhaps at least 50 to 70 feet.  it was very close to the second-floor bedroom window; and stayed still for at least 10 seconds in plain sight; just hovering, as if it knew ���i��� was in there. (at least that���s how i felt!)  then it slowly moved away then shot off as if into nothingness.

we continued to watch the sky but did not see any more flying objects after this one took off.

my mother had the presence of mind to call the university of cincinnati to find out if there had been reports of any ufo sightings. i don���t recall which department she called; neither does she; but it would make sense that she might have contacted a scientist at this large institution. 

anyhow, surprisingly, she was told by a gentleman at the school that they had received many reports of ufo sightings that day from throughout the city! we were not alone in this experience apparently. no further contact was ever made by the school to us, or vice versa. this was the only organization we contacted; no police were involved in making a report as i think mom didn���t want us to be seen as being delusional or crazy citizens.

my mother did not get hysterical during this entire episode, but she was excited.  when i talked to her last week about it, she did say she remembered seeing a ufo but did not recall the details like i did. she did say she thought it was cigar shaped, though. (back then she was about 40 years old and is now in her 70s and in good health.)

i was sad to see that there were no reports of ufo sightings in our local daily paper, the cincinnati enquirer; at least i didn���t see any. nor did view any stories on tv news or radio programs. looking back, i���m not sure if people just didn���t contact the media���or they did, and the media decided to not cover the sightings.

after this amazing encounter, i took out every ufo book i could find from the bookmobile. i recall reading about project blue book in particular. (side  note: can't believe all official govt. investigations are closed.)  by reading such materials i thought i would validate what we had encountered and give us some sort of answers to questions that were understandably gnawing at us.  at the very least, again, i discovered that we weren���t the only people to see similar ships, and that the details of these sightings had some commonalities with other sightings. 

as i grew up, i discovered a new attraction towards sci-fi novels and any type of space exploration tv shows. today, i am an ardent fan of the sci-fi channel, and very open to the idea that we���ve probably been contacted by other-worldly civilizations���but our government is mum about such activities. that���s my take on the matter. i'm also a catholic, but do not know how to integrate this experience into my faith life.

mom and i share a high level of esp ability, and later i found out i qualified for mensa. i do wonder if those were factors in us being "chosen" to see them--or was it all chance?

thank you for the opportunity to share my story. it���s not as thrilling or mind-boggling as many of your reports for ohio, but in some small way i hope it encourages others to come forward to tell others about their experiences. i still do fear ridicule for telling the truth.
content.summary: Multiple ufos with strobe lights zipping overhead me  in cincinnati baseball fields, hovering above in formation. witnessed by teen & her mother.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from sarasota around 7 pm last night. i was late getting out of sarasota so i exited i-75 at the brandon mall exit (highway 60)to save time. my mind was on getting home and not getting a ticket and listening to a cool cd that i had gotten yesterday afternoon. as i was driving, i remember thinking that i must tell a friend of mine that "they" are here and that "they've" been here for a very, very long time (from reading zecharia sitchin's books about the nefilim). then no sooner did i think that thought that i then looked up in the sky ahead of me between brandon and lakeland and all of a sudden something caught my eye and i thought "boy that's weird, i've never seen an airplane with all of those colors." i kept watching it expecting that as i got closer that i would recognize that it was an airplane. then the next thing i thought was "oh, my god... it's a ufo!" my next thought as i tried to talk myself out of it was... "that can't be a plane. i've never seen a plane shaped like that." then the colors all along the bottom started to spin around and around in a band all around the bottom of the craft with regulated intermittent black outs (like morse code only with colors that moved around the craft but they didn't blink). it looked oval or round in shape with a round domed top. the light band was all along the bottom occupying approximately 1/4 of the craft. the colors moved from left to right. there was some sort of dim light on the top but the bottom perimeter spun round and round with the blocks of color. then i thought again... "oh, my god it is a ufo... why aren't people pulling off the highway? why aren't other people seeing this?" i watched it up in the sky ahead of me until i had to turn off of highway 60 to reach my home in south lakeland. this is my account of my experience last night while driving between brandon and lakeland, florida on highway 60 at approximately 7:00.
content.summary: Saw ufo with band of colors along bottom of craft between brandon and lakeland, florida last night, january 20, 2008 at around 7:00 pm.

content.detailedDescription: We were awake with our baby at 4:45/5 am and looked out over the river in westport ma. we my husband and i, saw a bright light in the dark sky- there were no stars near it, no city lights and it was before sunrise.It looked as though orange, yellow, white colors were fading in and out of the light when we saw it.  we looked at it through binoculars and it was bright and steady for a good 45 minutes before we finished feeding our son and going back to sleep- we woke up at 7 and the sun was up and it was gone-
content.summary: cresent shaped/boomerang bright light remained still for about 10 mins.  slowly moved up

content.detailedDescription:
i can't recall the exact date or year that happened since it was so long ago...I was in high school at the time in the mid 1980's and i can say it was around 1984 or 1985. i don't recall the exact month either. when this happened i sort of just dismissed it and put in the back of my head.
i did not record any data.

i lived in an area called 'top of the hill' in daly city, california. it's just next to san francisco, literally just a few blocks, but it belongs to the adjacent san mateo county. this area has a small hill facing east, to the north is san francisco and the open pacific ocean to the exact west, which i had a clear view to from my backyard.

i used to practice an exercise routine on my backyard on the weekday evenings so it could have been a tuesday-friday. the weather was a little foggy , which is typical of this area in the spring, summer,and fall; with a light breeze and pleasant. the fog was not too low but high around 2000 feet...The night was quiet with only a few neighborhood sounds on the background. 

i don't know what made me turn around and look east towards the top of the hill, but there appeared a black triangle shaped object flying by. the triangle was metallic dark with a green glow around the edges and spinning in the most 'subtle' way, a slow spin while it flew overhead. there was absolutely no sound at all. just the spinning and flying-floating away. it was the size of a small house, 100 feet each side in the triangle.

the whole experience lasted only a few seconds..? it transversed from the east 'top of the hill' and headed west towards the pacific ocean until it disappeared into the horizon and fog. the speed was low as to float on air then it sped up into the ocean.

it left me puzzled for a few minutes and then i tried to explain and use the laws of physics to categorize. it was not an airplane. not a helicopter. not a blimp. all the aircraft i have seen to date do not compare a bit. not even the 'new' stealth bombers that exist today and this was the mid 1980's. characteristics that stand out were: floating and spinning slowly as it flew overhead and total silence. not a buzz or engine, not even with wind changes to take into consideration. 

i was dumbfounded for a few minutes after. i told my brother about the incident at that time but left it there as a big question mark. the years have gone by and it's not until these days of internet that i was made aware that other people have seen similar objects. i don't know if others saw what i experienced then. i haven't found any information online. 
i am still curious what that was and if i was the only person looking up at that point. in a city like san francisco with the bay area having 5 million people i wonder how that went 'unnoticed'? is there more information?
i wonder.
content.summary: Dark triangle with green light glow on the edges

content.detailedDescription: I had a strong instinct that something was coming,so i wrote president nixon in red crayon ,that the aliens were coming.I never told my parents because they never listened to me.The night of the incident after midnight i quietly got my kodak brownie camera and my bike,and left the house.We lived at 4338 merrell rd.In dallas,texas.I waited at sexton and crestline on my bike for what was to come,i did not know what a ufo was.After an hour or so i saw a dark collaseum like object high in the sky with red lights come closer and hover over midway rd. and sexton ln.It had a loud circling sound,as it hovered it shot out a spotlight along the ground as if searching then it shot out rays of light blowing holes into the asphalt.People started to look out windows and come outside as i rolled my bike closer.A womans voice yelled out something from the ship then the spotlight found me.A strong force and a heavy sound without a light pulled me on the bike into the air.People were screaming as the force carried me high into the air until it ditched me in mexico.Then i saw the ship land so i walked a good distance to it.I took a picture of it with my camera.I walked up the platform ramp and went inside where i saw this very big woman and the aliens with big black eyes,long fingers,with skin like the texture of a whale or shark but not wet.They were the same size i was and seemed to have animal instincts like that of a cat. i became scared when they pushed me to a table where they opened my skin with their fingers it didn't hurt but it wasn't understandable.They stopped being forceful with me when i calmed down and they sensed that i wasn't afraid.They stopped looking at me and one of them took me to the center of the ship that was a crystal like opened area that flashed lights back and forth and hummed and then got louder.There was a small window where i literally saw the earth disappear into a tiny sphere then it was gone.The ship moved so fast it's hard to say.There were others of all ages on the ship that had been there a long time,some were scared of the woman others of the aliens.I got into a small circular ship with one of the aliens it had windows all around.It flew into a galaxy that had two suns and we landed on the planet that was a botanical nightmare. the plants moved and were dangerously grand.The alien became scared so we left. i'm trying to remember everything with time i will.The bigger ship landed back in the jungle so i walked out on the ramp where u.S. government men were yelling then one grabbed me and as the aliens came out they began rapid fire killing the aliens.They put me in a jeep with gov't guys that drove me through a thicket of jungle every now and then they had to stop and cut the path.They said the neighbors reported my abduction and they had several witnesses in mexico as to the location. i later learned they had tracked the ufo from airplanes and the radio.The woman was able to send radio contact from the ship.Of course they confiscated my camera and i've never seen the photos i took but they would have been great.They put me in a van with two guys from the c.I.A. that drove me back to dallas from mexico.They dropped me off at love field airport where i called my parents.They were furious since they thought i had ran away it seemed like i had been gone a few days when in fact it was more like a month.A few days later the guys came by the house with my bike and told my parents that i had been abducted. the neighborhood was in a frenzy so the gov't hauled me in and told me that i have to say that yes there was a ufo but to not give out other details. i had to talk to the media to as they say "calm the people down".I learned that as the force drew me up with the ship it had also pulled people out of they're beds onto the ceiling.One man held onto the side of his rooftop to keep from getting pulled up.The gov't moved alot of them out of their houses.Later i only saw one of the neighbors in high school"ann".I had many people stand by me that i had the experience other's like carl sagan badgered me to no end and called me a liar.I stood my ground then as well as now with people trying to hide behind their fears.You haven't seen it all until you've seen the earth disappear in the window. there's so much more missing that having a therapist would greatly help.Over the years i have said nothing to anyone,because i have not been able to remember.
content.summary: I was sitting on my bike on watching this huge ship hover and shoot a light beam  around the ground then another beam shoot holes in the road.Located at midway rd. and sexton ln. in dallas.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home with my wife mary on mckinney rd, heading se from the intersection of mayhill rd, before making a left hand turn onto grissom rd, an large, chevron-shaped, glowing, amber colored object flew directly past us overhead, along our same se direction of travel. the sighting lasted just long enough for us to look up through the front windshield and remark on it; approximately 2 seconds.

the height and size of the object is impossible for us to properly determine. however, a rough estimate would make it about the size of an asprin at arm's length, and 1,500 ft in altitude.

no noise was heard.
content.summary: My wife and i were a couple of blocks away from coming home when we a large amber colored object flew by overhead.

content.detailedDescription:
We were at a barbque with a radio disjocky. we have helicopter flying over all the time due to being near the 29 palms marine base. so when saw the lights at first we thought there where 3 helicopters. when it got near to us we noticed there where no sound at all. at each point there was a round very bright white light.  when it got over us it was dusk and we could see the outline of the entire craft. it was huge and triangler in shape. it was very close to the ground. it was headed toward the base we tought maybe it was an expariment by the military. the disjocky the next day called a friend at the base who said they have no reports and he then called someone in command they to said they heard nothing. jim boxley the dj then decided to put on the air for anyone who saw the same thing we did and to call him. he had many calls, i am not sure just how many. my friend who lives with us talked to a few people who also saw it

last night we watched the larry king show and the two ladies on the program saw the same thing we did.

we all kept it to ourselves due to my political ties in this area and did not want people to think we are crazy. this is the first we talked about it since we saw it. until now i feel confident what we saw was real. i should tell you we are to to terribly far from area 51. i also cannot under stand how an objest that big can go toward the marine base any no one said anything from the base.
content.summary: Triangle shape with 3 lights, no sound and approx 2 football fields

content.detailedDescription:
I came home later in the evening (still lived with the folks) and didn't feel like going in just yet. our deck on the back of the house made it easy to climb up onto the balcony off my parents bedroom and then up onto the roof where i would go once and a while and lay in the crease of the roof line and stare up at the sky.

i was laying on my back and i heard something moving through the air. the only noise was the air flow...What i'd imagine a glider would sound like. no engine sound at all. i looked into the direction of the sound and saw this large dark shape flying low over the rooftops (which is how i estimated the size using the area on the roof). it was no more than 50ft above the rooftops and it flew directly above me giving me the erie feeling that it meant to. it did not turn or change speed which was not much faster than a car driving through a neighborhood. our house was in a large newer subdivision and the terrain sloped down to the east which was the back of the house (house faced west). the object was heading east south east and i watched it 'glide' off into the distance and got the impression it was moving along the slope, as in maintaining the same height above the rooftops, because it seemed to get lower than my vantage point as i watched it disappear. 

it was definetly triagle shaped and i remember thinking it was like a large hang glider. no lights and no sound other than airflow. 

at the time our house in millrise was the south end of the city of calgary. it was partly cloudy that night and a little cool.

cheers
content.summary: Dark triangle shape about the size in the roof top of an average house.

content.detailedDescription: I have seen this ufo in my town once before and i saw one just like it not too far back it was a white pulsing light instead of a red pulsing light well this object was moving from east to west quickly it flew right over my house it is cloudy tonight and it descended out of the clouds then the bright pulsing light got my attention it was starlike and was flying pretty low and it made no noise
content.summary: Return of strange pulsing red object

content.detailedDescription: On the night of november 18, 2007, i was flying into houston on flight co 1848. it was around 9:05 when the pilot announced we would be landing in houston in about 10 minutes and to fasten our seatbelts. i was sitting 3 or 4 seats behind the left wing of the 737. i was staring outside my window into the pitch blackness of the night wondering just where my location could be if i was 10 minutes from houston. suddenly, a bright circle of light (like a headlight from a car) started falling straight down from the sky with extreme speed. my first impression was, "where did this bright moon come from". i quickly realized it was too bright and it was quickly falling straight down. i elbowed my wife and she saw a few seconds of the light falling. as i was watching the light, the wing of the 737 got in the way of my view. i thought to myself... " i'll just wait until it reapears again under the wing". to my surprise it did reapear for a second or two, but then, without slowing its' speed, it suddenly sped to the left (towards the back of the plane). the pattern was a perfect "l" (but backward). my wife looked at me and asked," what was that?" i was shocked and spooked because i could not believe what i had just seen. i even forgot to mention it to the flight attendent or the pilots. i am pretty sure the pilot saw something also because it happened towards his frontal left side of his seat. needless to say, i was not able to sleep much that night just thinking over and over of what i had seen. i bring this incident up now because i wonder... could the 10 minutes from houston be somewhere over the vicinity of stephenville, texas?
content.summary: Bright circle of light.   no blinking of colored lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Jan 5th at approximately 11pm we were driving home from a ski trip and were going to spend the night in amarillo.  we were driving south on 385 approximately 35-40 minutes outside of amarillo when my husband awakened me to show me a strange appearing string of lights to the west.  it appeared to be approximately a mile long and the lights were arranged in pairs (i counted 35 pairs). the red lights would fade on and off together, cycling about 1-2 seconds.  the string of lights never moved and it was difficult to tell exactly how far away it was since distance can be deceiving late at night.  we are not aware of any kind of structure like that in the area and we have travelled this road many times and never seen this before.  at the time, we were the only vehicle traveling south on this road (it's a back road that connects amarillo to channing).  

we were very curious about the object from the moment we could see it until we passed it and it was out of site.  the object remained stationary the whole time and we never could come up with a plausible explanation.  when we heard about the stephenville incident that occurred on jan 8th, we immediately thought of the object we had seen on jan 5th.  the massive size and light configuration matched exactly what we saw.  i spoke with steve allen and told him of what we had seen and he said he is aware of the back road we were driving and says there is nothing but land in that area.

just thought we would pass this on.....We didn't take phots because 
1. my husband was tired and ready to get to the hotel and our camera was packed in the back and
2. it was so dark outside and was off in a distance, it probably wouldn't have shown up anyway.
content.summary: Jan 5th object that matches newspaper descriptions and is unexplained......

content.detailedDescription: I retired from the national nuclear security administration three years and few months ago after thirty years service. one morning while doing the out side inventory checks.I was invintorying the special nuclear material holding tanks when i saw a tringular shaped object with a round white light at each corner in the center it had a red revolving light . it apeared to be about one hundred feet over the beta three building travleing at three to five miles per hour makeing no sound at all.I'm a sport pilot and have just finished my buildind my second expiremental aircraft, i knew this wasn't any aircraft i had ever saw before.A helicopter would have made alot of sound and a fixted wing it would have stalled and crashed at that speed. it was a quite night with unlimited visibality.The object passeed dirrectly over head at an altitude of about two hundred feet  and  travled arround three hundred yards then turned left and flew over the security headquarters building and out of sight toward building 9212.This area is a no fly zone no aircraft are allowed in this area. my first reaction was to report it as soon as possible.I went to the shift supervisors office and told him what i had saw.His reaction was to ask me what i had been smokeing .I told him i'll never tell you bastards anything else he didn't take it very well to say the least.When you work at a nuclear weapons production plant you have to be very carefull to not be labled as a nut or worse . it was never reported to security as far as i know. to keep my job i kept my mouth shut. this happened at the y12 nuclear plant in oak ridge tn. i spell check this so please look over the spelling.
content.summary: Triangular about one feet wide with lighted corners and a rotating red light in the center.

content.detailedDescription:
About 10pm i was preparing to sleep in my car on a friend's property on elk ridge, s. humboldt county, about 3 miles from briceland. i just filed a report on a sighting i had in the late 70s. this sighting took place about 2 miles from the other one more than 20 years later. i had a nissan sentra that you could fold the back seat down and i had made that into a bed with foam pads (i'm small). i had just settled down, head to back of car, hatch up, was looking at sky through hatch window, looking generally east, when i noticed maybe six to ten white pts of light moving very strangely in relationship to each other. they were already there when i noticed them, so i don't know how long they had been there. i was extremely tired, was at that time a reporter and had just put in a 10 hour day getting the paper out. also, now know i was very ill with undiagnosed lyme disease. i know it sounds strange, but because of those things i could not stay awake and i went to sleep watching them. 

i first noticed the objects because of their number and the strange movement. i don't know how to describe it, i could make the motion with my hands for you if you were here. they were dancing with each other. in twos, but they'd change partners every so often. it was sort of like a swarm of gnats, but much more mechanical and regular. it was sort of like a couple of kids at camp with flashlights, playing tag with their lights on a wall, but again much more rhythmic and regular. very rhythmic. if you imagine two planets orbiting an unseen sun in same orbit, equidistant from each other, but they both reverse direction at each halfway point, that's as close as i can get to it. it was very hypnotic, as well, which might also explain how i could possible fall asleep watching them. 

my first thought when i saw them was i was seeing insects very close to me, illuminated by the car's interior light. but then i turned the light off and saw that they were distant, over the hill line about 1/2 mile away. the hill line 1/2 mile away, the lights were clearly way up in the sky. i lost sight of the objects when i went to sleep. when i woke up next day, no sign of anything unusual.
content.summary: Multiple dancing white lights viewed in sky

content.detailedDescription: Driving home east on 60 an object appeared to the right side of the highway across from the airport. i was driving with my 7 year old grandson in front daughter, and infant in back seat. i observed an object sort of like stream in and thought it was a low flying plane getting ready to land at airport. there was a blue round light on the bottom of object. the blue light flashed once then seemed to travel at a slant then vanished, all very quickly. i turned to my daughter and asked if she saw that! she said, saw what? my grandson quickly said i did! what was that? i asked what did you see? he said he saw it come in and the blue light blinked, left up and was gone. i asked him to draw me a picture when we got home, then told him that i think we just saw a ufo. he asked what a ufo is. i told them it's called an unidentified flying object, something we can't explain. when we got home he drew what he saw and it corresponded with what i had witnessed, but he seemed to see more detail than me in his drawing.
content.summary: Entered, round blue light blinked, exited upward then dissappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Above time is only a possibility. this took place in the summer/early fall of either 1977, 78 or 79. however, i'm sure the time was 11 pm to midnight. my husband and i lived in a very rural area of souther humboldt county ca, on elk ridge, about 3 miles from briceland ca. we had a house on a 40 acre parcel, no one else closer than that. we slept in the summer in an outside bed next to house, 360 degree view of sky, watched sky every night going to bed (so i'm very familiar with normal phenomena in the sky). one night, my husband was already asleep, but i was still watching stars, glasses on, extremely clear night, absolutely no chance of optical illusion. 

i noticed coming from the nnw, a red point of light. if it had not been moving, i would have thought it was a star. i knew it was not an airplane (moving too fast, no sound), a meteor (i've seen those, no tail), a shooting star (came steadily in an arc, not falling, maintained constant elevation, but was about as fast as a falling star) or the satillite we saw every now and then (faster, red, satillite is white). i drew an imaginary line in the sky, projecting its path to go right between the gap in the milky way. it did that, just after passing thru the gap, it made a rt angle turn more or less westerly and then disappeared in an instant. it all happened so fast i couldn't think to wake my husband to see it. 

what made me first notice the object was its motion. i would have looked at an airplane as well, but then i was riveted by how fast it was going.
when i first noticed it i knew immediately it was nothing i'd ever seen before. could not see any particulars of it, no shape, pt of light only, bright red, redder than mars. constant motion until it turned.

i did not have time to react before it was gone, but the instant it disappeared, my heart gave a huge jump, adrenalin shot all thru me, fight or flight reaction, knees weak. i grabbed my husband and shook him awake and was so excited i could barely tell him what happened. it took me hours to get to sleep and i've been avid about ufos ever since. i saw them again 20 years later, i assume you want me to file that separatley and i will right now.
content.summary: Rapid moving red pt of light  approached me, when overhead, made at speed rt angle turn, then disappeared
